Develop​ ​ back-end​ ​ in​ ​ PHP ​ framework​ ​ Laravel

projects.title: BookMySched
projects.description: BookMySched is a web-based scheduling system that offers a user friendly, easy to use scheduler with elegant UI. It provides a complete solution for appointment management.
features: Superadmin​ - ​ ​ ​ Superadmin​ ​ has​ ​ total​ ​ control​ ​ of​ ​ the​ ​ system.​ ​ It​ ​ has​ ​ the​ ​ ability​ ​ to​ ​ view,​ ​ edit, and​ ​ delete​ ​ organizations​ ​ from​ ​ the​ ​ system.

Admin​ ​ - ​ ​ Further​ ​ the​ ​ admin​ ​ of​ ​ the​ ​ organization​ ​ whom​ ​ we​ ​ will​ ​ sell​ ​ our​ ​ product​ ​ to​ ​ can add,​ ​ edit​ ​ and​ ​ remove​ ​ employees​ ​ and​ ​ employees’​ ​ availability.
Employee​ ​ - ​ ​ The​ ​ employees​ ​ of​ ​ that​ ​ organization​ ​ can​ ​ view​ ​ the​ ​ calendar,​ ​ book,​ ​ reschedule or​ ​ cancel​ ​ appointments.
Services​ ​ - ​ ​ Admin​ ​ can​ ​ add​ ​ or​ ​ remove​ ​ services.​ ​ Customers​ ​ will​ ​ be​ ​ charged​ ​ according​ ​ to the​ ​ services​ ​ they​ ​ take.
History​ ​ - ​ ​ All​ ​ the​ ​ past​ ​ appointments,​ ​ including​ ​ canceled​ ​ or​ ​ rescheduled​ ​ appointments, can​ ​ be​ ​ viewed​ ​ with​ ​ a ​ ​ date​ ​ picker.

Search​ ​ - ​ ​ A ​ ​ fully-functional​ ​ search​ ​ feature​ ​ for​ ​ searching​ ​ database​ ​ records​ ​ for appointments,​ ​ users,​ ​ clients​ ​ etc​ ​ based​ ​ on​ ​ the​ ​ authorization​ ​ of​ ​ the​ ​ logged​ ​ in​ ​ user.
